Interface ec.ez.collect.NameTable

public interface NameTable
A potentially mutable mapping from names (strings) to values (arbitrary objects, including null). NameTables inherit from each other in a tree like fashion, so they can be used to model nesting lexical environments. The associations in the most leafward part of a NameTable are called "locals".

The type NameTable only provides query operations but a subtype, NameTableEditor, provides edit operations as well. A given NameTable reference may or may not actually be a NameTableEditor, depending on whether it is supposed to grant edit authority.

extend(String[], Object[])
Like sprout, but also defines in the result each pair of a name and a value.
get(String)
What value is associated with 'name'? Uses the first associating up the inheritance chain.
mapping()
A snapshot of the name-to-value mapping represented by this NameTable.
optDefiningTable(String)
This NameTable potentially inherits from other NameTables.
readOnly()
Returns the NameTable stone-cast to give only a read-only view.
sprout()
Makes and returns a new NameTableEditor that inherits from this NameTable.
sprout(boolean)
Version of sprout that flags this level of the NameTable as permitting redefinition if the redefOK flag is set.

optDefiningTable 
 public abstract NameTable optDefiningTable(String name) throws AlreadyDefinedException
This NameTable potentially inherits from other NameTables. Of all these NameTable, which one defines 'name'? A child has priority over its parents, but a collision between parents throws an AlreadyDefinedException. If none define 'name', return null. XXX Security bug: A read-only NameTable will reveal read-write parents.

get 
 public abstract Object get(String name) throws NotFoundException, AlreadyDefinedException
What value is associated with 'name'? Uses the first associating up the inheritance chain.

readOnly 
 public abstract NameTable readOnly()
Returns the NameTable stone-cast to give only a read-only view. If this NameTable is already read-only, just return it.

sprout 
 public abstract NameTableEditor sprout()
Makes and returns a new NameTableEditor that inherits from this NameTable. This new NameTable starts with an empty set of locals.

sprout 
 public abstract NameTableEditor sprout(boolean redefOK)
Version of sprout that flags this level of the NameTable as permitting redefinition if the redefOK flag is set.

extend 
 public abstract NameTableEditor extend(String names[],
                                        Object values[]) throws ArityMismatchException, AlreadyDefinedException
Like sprout, but also defines in the result each pair of a name and a value. The names and values arrays must have the same arity.

mapping 
 public abstract Mapping mapping()
A snapshot of the name-to-value mapping represented by this NameTable. This is composed through the inheritance chain, with a child's association occluding a parent's association for the same name.
